title: Identifying toxic workplace patterns early
content:
Scenario: Identifying toxic workplace patterns early
    Given Aisha is inexperienced with workplace dynamics
    And toxic workplaces can be normalizing
    When the workplace_elohim monitors organizational patterns
    Then it should flag exploitative practices
    And it should identify when workplace violates care principles
    And it should help her recognize red flags
    And the system should protect her from normalizing abuse
    And she should learn what healthy workplace care looks like
    And early warning should enable protective action
